settings.brand_callout_text_1: Steel is the most recycled material on the planet. Each Vitaly piece may therefore contain remnants of machines, skyscrapers or car parts — a cycle that continually influences our design practice.
settings.brand_callout_title_3: Genderless pieces produced with 100% recycled stainless steel.
